dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3958 IH: Healing Our Heroes Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Broun of Georgia introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To provide for a one-year extension of the Department of Veterans Affairs pilot program on assisted living services for veterans with traumatic brain injury.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Healing Our Heroes Act.

section.header: One-year extension of Department of Veterans Affairs pilot program on assisted living services for veterans with traumatic brain injury
section.text: Section 1705 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2008 (Public Law 110–181; 122 Stat. 491; 38 U.S.C. 1710C note) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), by striking five-year pilot program and inserting six-year pilot program; and
in subsection (e)(1), by striking the completion of the pilot program and inserting the date on which the pilot program has been carried out for five years.
